mapper.select:
select devName as equipName,
(CASE WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '上轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '上轴承润滑' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '下轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '下轴承润滑' WHEN SC_PART='进料管、进料短接、溢流弯管、阀门' THEN '管道阀门' WHEN SC_PART='轴承体' and SC_CONTENT='润滑油质是否符合要求' THEN '油质' WHEN SC_PART='轴承体' and SC_CONTENT='润滑油油位是否在标准范围内' THEN '油位' WHEN SC_PART='填料' and SC_CONTENT='密封是否良好，是否损伤' THEN '填料密封' WHEN SC_PART='填料' and SC_CONTENT='水封水压力是否正常' THEN '水封水' else SC_PART END ) as part, SC_CONTENT as content , RESULT as result, ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ((ZONE_NAME='浮选底层区域一' AND devName LIKE '%脱泥泵')
OR (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND (ZONE_NAME='FX150-GT脱泥旋流器' OR devName LIKE '%搅拌桶')) ) AND TASKSTART_TM="${time}"
ORDER BY FIELD(equipName,'脱泥旋流器','原矿4.5m搅拌桶','再磨4m搅拌桶','1#选硫搅拌桶','2#选硫搅拌桶','1#脱泥泵','2#脱泥泵'),part

select
'浮选机' as equipName
,CONCAT(devName,'--',(CASE WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '上轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '上轴承润滑' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '下轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '下轴承润滑'
ELSE SC_PART END )) as part ,RESULT as result ,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' and devName like '%浮选机' AND ALTPID>0 AND TASKSTART_TM="${time}" ORDER BY CAST(TRIM('#' FROM part) AS SIGNED)
